rev.desc.rev.desc: issue where related calls are updated multiple times when incident is closed
added expression to the post.this panel:
This way it is cleared out everytime through and is reset for each call.

If the process has been rescheduled due to a locked call record (incidents) then the Call ID will be stored in the schedule record. This should be used to build the query for only that record. This will prevent multiple processing of call records.
removed the {" "} from all 3 resolution strings on the post.resolution panel

Modified the apm.start.link.close application to blank out the $L.depends variable before processing each related record. If this wasn't done the incdepends record already had a unique key in it (which was a duplicate of the last one), and a new record would not be generated.
Modified to get the $L.macro.format.name from the schedule record. This is passed to apm.compute.link.close
Changed the application to use a link record based on the SM enviornment record for link entered into the post back link field.
Set background of apm.setup.globals to true.
Changed the error exit on the apm.setup.globals to continue on instead of erroring out.

descript.descript: issue where related calls are updated multiple times when incident is closed
added expression to the post.this panel:
This way it is cleared out everytime through and is reset for each call.

If the process has been rescheduled due to a locked call record (incidents) then the Call ID will be stored in the schedule record. This should be used to build the query for only that record. This will prevent multiple processing of call records.
removed the {" "} from all 3 resolution strings on the post.resolution panel

Modified the apm.start.link.close application to blank out the $L.depends variable before processing each related record. If this wasn't done the incdepends record already had a unique key in it (which was a duplicate of the last one), and a new record would not be generated.
Modified to get the $L.macro.format.name from the schedule record. This is passed to apm.compute.link.close
Changed the application to use a like record based on the SM enviornment record for link entered into the post back link field.
Set background of apm.setup.globals to true.
Changed the error exit on the apm.setup.globals to continue on instead of erroring out.
